name: Chutes 'N Cannons
description:
Made in a week for 8 bits to infinity puzzle jam 2 with a theme of "slide". This is my first game jam!

***Just realized I left an item in the "rocket" room that makes the game winnable without having to go through the rest of the game. It was placed there for testing purposes and didn't get taken out before the final, frantic build was exported :(  I'll replace the game build once the voting is over :( :(  (live & learn :) ***

Most of the controls are shown in the game, but:

"A" and "D" move left and right.

"W" jumps.

"E" interacts.

"X" to drop current item.

"V" to grab crates.

"R" will reset all items and progress back to the start.

"P" for fullscreen. "ESC" to exit full screen.
